Texto: 
minimal discomfort on presentation for ultrasound, no palpable abnormality
innumerable punctate radiodense foci within the testicular parenchyma without mass lesion, otherwise normal testicular echotexture.
testicular microlithiasis
testicular microlithiasis
9 year old white male with testicular pain, evaluation requested to rule out torsion.
testicular microlithiasis is more unusual in the pediatric population.
